snippet.title: Alien Cat 2 - PC Gameplay (Steam)
snippet.description:
This is the second in the Alien Cat series, which spans 8 (yes, 8!) games. This time being a puzzle game where you must collect coins while controlling multiple clones at the same time. If one dies, the level restarts.

Alien Cat series (C) Repa Games
Steam version published by КиКо / kuko games
Also released on SEGA Mega Drive and Evercade (as part of Indie Heroes Collection 1, which uses the Mega Drive port)

#aliencat #aliencat2 #repagames #steam #steamgames #steamgame #steamindies
